issues.problem: Page/layout uses 'use client' but contains SEO-critical content
issues.seoImpact: Search engines may not index client-rendered SEO content. Server Components are preferred for SEO-critical pages.
issues.recommendedFix: Move SEO-critical content to a Server Component. Extract interactive parts into separate client components.

issues.seoImpact: Without generateStaticParams, dynamic pages use SSR instead of SSG.
issues.recommendedFix: Add generateStaticParams() to pre-generate static pages for known paths.

issues.seoImpact: Pages without unique titles rank poorly and have reduced click-through rates.
issues.recommendedFix: Add metadata export: export const metadata = { title: 'About Us' }

issues.problem: Page missing meta description in metadata export
issues.seoImpact: Pages without meta descriptions show auto-generated snippets in search results.
issues.recommendedFix: Add description to metadata: export const metadata = { description: 'Learn about our company' }

issues.problem: Skipped heading level: H1 â†’ H3 (expected H2)
issues.seoImpact: Skipped heading levels break the document outline and reduce SEO structure.
issues.recommendedFix: Change <h3> to <h2> or add intermediate heading levels.

issues.seoImpact: The <main> tag helps search engines identify the primary content area.
issues.recommendedFix: Wrap the primary content area in a <main> tag.

issues.seoImpact: Poorly formatted URLs reduce readability and may affect search rankings.
Missing dimensions cause Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS), a Core Web Vital.
issues.recommendedFix: Add width and height attributes to prevent layout shift.
